Class IssueModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • negotiator.boaframework.opponentmodel.agentsmithv2.IssueModel

  • public class IssueModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which keeps track of the issues for an optimized version of the Smith Frequency Model.
    Author:
    Mark Hendrikx
